thread.title: Stephanie Cleveland
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by Stephanie Cleveland

author: Stephanie Cleveland
title: Stephanie Cleveland
text: I found some small brass antique kerosene lamps in my Grandmother's belongings after she passed away and thought I would try to restore them. I was amazed to even find what I needed at all, but Antique Lamp Supply had everything and categorized so that a novice like me could figure out what to order. The items arrived so quickly, delicately and protectively wrapped, and now I have 2 beautiful lamps on display as a reminder of what they looked like at her house! Thanks!! :-)
